Class CombatZoneLv1

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.model.adventurecard.AdventureCard
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.model.adventurecard.CombatZoneLv1
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CombatZoneLv1 extends AdventureCard
Represents a Level 1 Combat Zone adventure card.

This card challenges the players with a series of incoming shots and applies penalties such as crew loss and delays if the defense fails.

When this card is drawn, the player must defend against the specified list of Shots. If they fail to block any of them, they suffer a penalty in terms of lostMembers and lostDays.

This card delegates its gameplay logic to the CheckAndPenalty1Lv1 state.

See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • CombatZoneLv1

      public CombatZoneLv1(String id, AdventureCard.Type type, int lostDays, int lostMembers, ArrayList<Shot> shots)
      Constructs a new CombatZoneLv1 card with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      id - unique identifier for the card.
      type - type of the adventure card (must not be null).
      lostDays - number of days lost if the defense fails (must be ≥ 0).
      lostMembers - number of crew members lost if the defense fails (must be ≥ 0).
      shots - list of Shots that the player must defend against (must not be null or empty).
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if parameters are invalid.
      NullPointerException - if any shot in the list is null.
